title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI that lets you pull, create, and run GGUF models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: First-class LangChain LLM and Chat wrapper around Ollama’s local REST endpoint.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official async/sync Python client generated from the OpenAPI spec; upload images, chat, embed, pull models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI that proxies to a local Ollama instance; supports multi-user, RAG, presets.

title: continue-dev/continue (VS Code & JetBrains)
summary: Open-source coding assistant plugin that can use Ollama models for inline autocomplete and chat.

title: jmorganca/ollama-insights
summary: Small utility to benchmark/token-per-second profile any GGUF model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-rag (npm package)
summary: Lightweight Node module that combines Ollama chat with in-memory vector search for PDFs and text.

title: pypi: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper that adds shell completion, YAML config files, and bulk model download.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai)
summary: Haystack 2.0 generator & embedder components that plug into Ollama endpoints for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot (GitHub Copilot-local proxy)
summary: Drop-in proxy that converts GitHub Copilot protocol to Ollama so VS Code uses local models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama server + WebUI onto Kubernetes with GPU node selector.

title: ollama4j (Java/JVM client)
summary: Idiomatic Java/Kotlin client with reactive adapters and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that answers slash commands using any Ollama model; supports system prompts & threads.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: reddit/r/ollama – weekly model discussion
summary: Community thread sharing GGUF quantization tips and performance numbers for Llama-3-8B, Phi-3, etc.
